changelog: v1.5.1: Module 3 — Forge Tab / Fan Control. Preset selector (Silent/Balanced/Performance/Full Send), fan curve Chart.js chart, live RPM display via LibreHardwareMonitor WMI. Forge tab shown on Windows only. Persists active preset to profiles/fan_curve.json.
changes: NEW: Forge tab — shown on Windows only, hidden on Mac/Linux
NEW: Fan curve presets: Silent, Balanced, Performance, Full Send
NEW: Chart.js line chart — CPU temp vs fan speed% for active preset
NEW: Live fan RPM display via LibreHardwareMonitor WMI (graceful N/A fallback)
NEW: Active preset persisted to profiles/fan_curve.json
